sentences.en: "I can't give you an answer now," he hedged.
sentences.cn: “我现在不能回答你，”他闪避道。

sentences.en: Any assistance you could give the police will be greatly appreciated.
sentences.cn: 您提供的任何帮助警方都将万分感谢。

sentences.en: give me the mainland any day!.
sentences.cn: 我宁愿选择大陆！。

sentences.en: Give the cardboard two or three coats of varnish to harden it.
sentences.cn: 在纸板上涂两三层清漆使其变硬。

sentences.en: Harry had carefully bought and wrapped presents for Mark to give them.
sentences.cn: 哈里精心购置了礼物又仔细包好，让马克交给他们。

sentences.en: He gave her a kiss (= kissed her) .
sentences.cn: 他吻了她一下。

sentences.en: He proceeded to give Dan directions to the computer room.
sentences.cn: 他接着告诉丹去计算机房该怎么走。

sentences.en: his strangely shaped feet gave him away.
sentences.cn: 他那双形状奇特的脚暴露了他的身份。

sentences.en: How very thoughtless. I'll give him a piece of my mind.
sentences.cn: 真是太没头脑了，我要告诉他我很生气。

sentences.en: I didn’t steal it! Maria gave it to me!
sentences.cn: 我不是偷的！是玛丽亚给我的！

sentences.en: I was given to understand that I had been invited.
sentences.cn: 我被告知得到了邀请。

sentences.en: I’ve got some old diaries that my grandmother gave me years ago.
sentences.cn: 我有几本旧日记本，是多年前祖母给我的。

sentences.en: If we give her enough rope, she will hang herself.
sentences.cn: 如果我们让她为所欲为，她一定会栽大跟头的。

sentences.en: It might give the Commission undue influence over the coming negotiations.
sentences.cn: 这可能会在即将开启的谈判问题上给委员会带来过多的影响。

sentences.en: Most people are willing to give to charity .
sentences.cn: 大多数人都愿意向慈善事业捐款。

sentences.en: Mr Dudley has pledged to give any award to charity.
sentences.cn: 达德利先生已承诺将任何所获的损害赔偿额都捐给慈善机构。

sentences.en: people who don't give a damn about the environment.
sentences.cn: 对环境漠不关心的人。

sentences.en: Researchers were given a £10,000 grant to continue their work.
sentences.cn: 研究人员得到一万英镑的经费以继续他们的研究。

sentences.en: She gave a shrug of her shoulders (= she shrugged ) .
sentences.cn: 她停下工作抬起头来打了个哈欠。

sentences.en: That was enough to give Mansell an unassailable lead.
sentences.cn: 那足以让曼塞尔获得别人无法撼动的领先地位。

sentences.en: The situation is now desperate, so please give generously .
sentences.cn: 现在情况危急，请大家慷慨解囊。

sentences.en: The whole idea was to give history a happy gloss.
sentences.cn: 整个想法就是要粉饰历史。

sentences.en: They say they’re not willing to give any more than they’ve already offered.
sentences.cn: 他们说就给原定的这些钱，不愿意再多给了。

sentences.en: They'll have to give up completely on certain of their studies.
sentences.cn: 他们将不得不彻底放弃某些研究。

sentences.en: This will give your promotional material individuality and style.
sentences.cn: 这会让你的促销品显得个性十足、格调高雅。

sentences.en: three hundred and fifty years ago, give or take a few.
sentences.cn: 350年前，估计相差至多只有几年。

sentences.en: We'll go there bursting to give it our all.
sentences.cn: 我们将去那里，渴望献出我们的一切。

sentences.en: What are you giving your father for his birthday?
sentences.cn: 你打算送给你父亲什么生日礼物？

sentences.en: When life gets hard and you want to give up, remember that life is full of ups and downs, and without the downs, the ups would mean nothing.
sentences.cn: 当生活很艰难，你想要放弃的时候，请记住，生活充满了起起落落，如果没有低谷，那站在高处也失去了意义。

words.tran_cn: 给；赠送（give的ing形式）；付出；产生
捐赠；面向；有弹性；气候转暖

phrases.phrase: give as good as one gets

phrases.tran_cn: 我宁愿要（或更喜欢）；我想要（或喜欢）
(非正式)别烦我（表示恼怒、抗议或不信）
牺牲自己的时间和精力；腾出时间和力量来帮助别人
增减……而无大变化；允许有小误差
(非正式)［用于表示某一数字的准确程度］相差不会超过…，出入至多…
分发，发出；公布，发表；用尽，精疲力竭
将新娘托付给新郎（婚礼的一个部分）

phrases.phrase: give someone to understand (或 believe 或 know)

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，主英)（严厉）惩罚（或斥责）某人
（无意中）泄露秘密（或暴露隐情）
放弃；对…表示绝望；对…不再期待
(非正式)有什么消息吗？近来怎么样啊？（常用作招呼语）

trans.tran_en: the ability of a material or substance to bend or stretch when put under pressure

trans.tran_cn: 交给，赠送，提供，捐助，用于…，使…受惩罚，传染疾病，举办使产生
trans.tran_en: to let someone have something as a present, or to provide something for someone
